benchmark_details.name: TIB-STC (Tibetan Structured Text Corpus)
benchmark_details.overview: TIB-STC is the first large-scale, expert-curated, and multi-domain dataset designed for the development and evaluation of LLMs for the Tibetan language, covering over 11 billion tokens across various domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support the development and evaluation of large language models for low-resource languages like Tibetan.

data.source: Expert-curated corpus sourced from literature, religion, medicine, law, and daily communication.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the proportion of valid responses and correctness.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better model performance on Tibetan-specific tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Sun-Shine model is evaluated against existing models like GPT-4o and DeepSeek-R1, demonstrating strong performance.
